name: Ghost Brawl
description:
This was made for LudumDare 37: One Room game jam.

you can use a gamepad or a keyboard to play.

You play a monster who's fighting ghosts away from his beer. The beer signifies your health and you use your two buttons to punch front or back row.

Created in 72 hours, solo development.

Created in Unity

Combination of Playmaker and C#

Music, sounds, theater curtains, and title card images are public domain.
